name: csm-music-engine
description: Music project featuring Web MIDI and Web Audio.

scripts.build: run-s build-clean && run-p build-scripts build-styles && echo Done build.
scripts.build-release: run-s build-clean && run-p build-scripts-release build-styles && echo Done build.
scripts.build-scripts-release: tsc && set NODE_ENV=production&& browserify build/main.js | uglifyjs -m > build/main.bundle.js
scripts.test: echo Not test driven, lol && exit 0

author: Chase Moskal <chasemoskal@gmail.com>
